# Life Path Number Calculator - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
React application for calculating Life Path Numbers (生命靈數) based on birthdate, displaying personality traits, and providing recommendations.

## Tech Stack
- React 18 with TypeScript
- Vite for build tooling
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- lowdb for NoSQL database
- Bilingual support (English/Chinese)

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold React + Vite project
- [ ] Customize project with Life Path Number features
- [ ] Install dependencies and compile
- [ ] Create and run dev server task
- [ ] Finalize documentation

## Features to Implement
1. Birthday input form
2. Life Path Number calculation (sum digits until single digit 1-9, handle master numbers 11, 22, 33)
3. Display personality traits for each number
4. Show missing numbers in birthdate
5. Recommendation system based on missing numbers/elements
6. Chinese/English bilingual support
